title: The Teemoing: cant press button to sacrifice minions
body:
I just watched a brofresco video when he mentioned "the teemoing" i searched it up but the button on the vat to sacrifice doesnt work, the teemoing screen seems like it has been devided in two parts, each with a different shade of colour.

Please help me quickly, i really want the icon

replies.body:
If you have a touch-screen the mouse won't work, only the touch-screen will.
(I don't know if that's the issue you're having though.)
DUDE I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM LIKE WTF

> [{quoted}](name=Un4g1ven,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Yi87wvIg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-03T01:33:13.146+0000)
>
> DUDE I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM LIKE WTF

do what LostFroster said, use the touch screen to click

You might be having plugin, extension, or [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)issues blocking you from interacting with the mini-game.  Try clearing your cache or running on Incognito for the fix.  You may also try another browser if all else fails.  Make sure you're logged in and I hope that helps!
